features: 4K Ultra HD Video for Content Creators - The digital camera's newest CMOS and chips help present super vivid videos with crisp, clear natural colors and easily achieve delicate details reproduction. Image stabilization prevents blurry images caused by slight hand shaking. And it's easier operation is very kind to teens and adults who are interested in photography.

Auto Focus 48MP Photography with Flash - Every happy moment is blockbuster! You can press the shutter button halfway down to focus on the target even after max 16X zoom, never worry about defocus and blurry. Its built-in flash will release a beam of powerful and less harsh light while presenting exquisite photos, great for selfie fill in light or inadequate light condition.

Compact Camera with Side-out Flip Screen - With a size of palm, this vlogging camera is a perfect take everywhere camera and will not take up much space in your bag. The side flip 3.0” LCD screen that also turns in 180 degree for easier composing selfie shots and selfie video recording. Coming with a lanyard and two rechargable batteries, You don't have to hold it all the trip and worry about it running out of battery.

Perfect Creative Camera for Photography - If you are tired of its automatic results, you can create your style videos and photos with so many funny functions. Time lapse to take a short video about sunrise or flower opening. Slow motion to capture lightning strikes or exciting moments. Pause function pauses the video and starts again after Transition.3 continuous shots, Selfie, Beauty, Smile Capture, Filters...... freely enjoy the fun of photography.

Reliable Warranty for This Ideal Gift - Quickly upload videos and pictures to computer by type C cable and HDMI cable to share your happiness with family on TV. Package includes a 4K camera, two batteries, 32GB memory card, HDMI cable, USB cable, adapter, lanyard, lens cover, small bag, one year warranty. It's a perfect gift for lovers, friends, children, or parents on Christmas, birthdays and all important events.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Digital Camera for Photography and Videos 4K Videos + 48MP Photos+ Built In Flash + CMOS Image Sensor ---- for photography lovers, starters, amateurs, vloggers---- Cameras are a reliable way to save your memories for the future. This digital camera delivers 4K videos at a bit of 60fps, and 48 megapixel photos. The CMOS sensor gives a very bright and detailed picture, so you will not notice any unnatural colors in the photo. Quickly Get Pros of This Camera: Superb autofocus Built-in flash4K video in HDRSolid ergonomics and control layout Sharp 16x digital zoom Flip-facing screenExcellent built-in microphone.

Save Your Memories For The Future Built-in Flash In poor lighting conditions, you’ll be able to brighten a dark scene, balance out diffused light, or eliminate unwanted shadows with a flash to enhance the appearance of your photographic subjects. Flip-out Screen The side flip-out LCD screen for easier to compose shoa side flip-out tiltable LCD screen for easier to compose shots - especially in selfie mode. Smooth 16X Digital Zoom It's very easy to shoot landscapes from a distance or see the tiny objects with zoom in. No matter in video recording or taking photos, zoom get changed smoothly.

Creative Photography Time lapse to take a short video about sunrise or flower opening. Slow motion to capture lightning strikes or exciting moments. Smile and Face Detection This 4K camera captures smile and detect human faces in shooting. You won't miss any stunning smiles and funny expression. Anti-shake Image Stabilization suppresses shake even while walking, which ensures clearer images even you are a strater in photography.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Truly exceeded my expectations
reviews.reviewText: This camera has truly exceeded my expectations with its outstanding performance. As a vlogger, I was particularly impressed by the quick and accurate autofocus, even in challenging low-light conditions. The 4K video quality is exceptional, delivering sharp and vibrant visuals, and the flip-up touchscreen adds to the ease of framing while recording. What sets this camera apart is the comprehensive package it comes with – a practical carrying case, two batteries, an SD card, and a mini HDMI cable, offering excellent value for users. Its beginner-friendly design and intuitive navigation make it accessible to all levels of users. The added pause function is a convenient feature that allows seamless continuation of filming. In summary, I highly recommend this camera to anyone seeking a high-quality vlogging experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable 4K camera with fliout large sceen for selfie
reviews.reviewText: I already own a Sony digital SLR camera but was looking for an economical camera for my daughter’s personal use. This is one of the best cameras for price and features. The Flip out large screen is what I love most, especially it makes the selfie mode easier. It’s a package deal as it comes with inbuild flash, 32 GB memory card. Picture quality is good, not tires the video so far, so can’t comment. It meets the needs of the teenager at the price. They can be used freely and everywhere as they’re not bulky to carry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality camera for a reasonable cost
reviews.reviewText: I bought this camera to take pictures of people's homes after they've suffered damage due to a storm. This camera was affordable and had everything I need to take quick, easy, high-quality pictures, and easily download them to my laptop.Sure, you can spend more money on a brand name, but this one works perfectly for my needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Overall happy with this camera
reviews.reviewText: Overall happy with this camera. Photos look good. It doesn’t feel bulky. It has a foldout screen so you can take selfies. It’s easy to use and pretty easily to transfer photos from camera to laptop. My son recently purchased a similar camera but he says he likes this one better.The camera comes with 2 batteries, USB cable and charger, 32gb memory card, a strap, lens cover and a small camera case/bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars high-quality images and videos
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the 4K Digital Camera and I must say, it exceeded my expectations in every way. As a photography enthusiast, I was looking for a camera that could deliver high-quality images and videos, and this camera did not disappoint.Firstly, the 48MP camera sensor produces stunningly detailed photos that capture every little nuance and color accurately. Whether you're shooting landscapes, portraits, or even macro shots, this camera ensures crystal clear images with vibrant colors.highly recommend for anyone, whether you're a teenager starting out in photography or an experienced adult looking to enhance your vlogging game. It offers exceptional image and video quality, advanced features like autofocus and anti-shake, and the convenience of a flip screen. With its excellent performance and value for money, this camera is definitely a worthy investment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clear picture quality
reviews.reviewText: This camera is easy to use and you learn how to use it in no time. The picture quality when taking photos is very good, and the video recording is also very clear. A memory card is also provided. Very cool!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Can’t control basic camera functions
reviews.reviewText: 4K Digital CameraBought this camera in hopes of having an inexpensive camera to just keep in my vehicle and have at the ready. However was quickly disappointed that this camera lacks basic camera controls. Unless I missed it in the functions menu, there is no way to control the ISO, F stop or shutter speed.The only thing that comes close to "control" is an exposure compensation.It does have a very high mega pixel rating, but not easily accessible. I took a video and some photos and tried to download them off of the memory card (32gb tf card included), but after about 15 minutes and numerous attempts, gave up. I was able to get one image, which I will share in this post. Every time I tried, it just locked up the directory. So I had to disconnect the camera from usb on computer and start over. After 5 or 6 attempts, I gave up. Tried moving images, right clicking to save and then copy to a directory on computer, all attempts failed.Tried to use it as a web cam (as this is one of the options in menu) but that didn’t show up anywhere on computer. So if there is a process that is different, the manual doesn’t speak to that.I saw the other reviews of this camera and my experience is completely contrary to those reviews. Maybe it is just a compatibility with my computer, I have a very powerful 8 core processor running at 3GHz with 24 GB of ram and multiple hard drives. So in every other chore, my computer works fine. Just apparently not compatible with my system. The one photo I did manage to download is clear, but over exposed. Again, with no normal basic controls, you get what you get.dDisappointed and gave up.Hope this helps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars You get what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: This is a perfectly fine camera for perfectly fine people. Not for anyone with artistic or photography skills. Definitely for the casual or noob. Easy to use. Sturdy. Takes nice photos, has cool options. It's a win, really.
